alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 6:10AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
